verses.roman:
bhakta-duḥkha dekhi' prabhu manete cintila
sannyāsīra mana phirāite mana ha-ila

synonyms: bhakta-duḥkha dekhi'-seeing the unhappiness of the devotees; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; manete cintila—considered within His mind; sannyāsīra mana—the minds of the Māyāvādī sannyāsīs; phirāite—to turn; mana ha-ila—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu decided.
translation: They submitted their request, and Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, seeing His devotees' unhappiness, decided to turn the minds of the Māyāvādī sannyāsīs.
